name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Unique identifier for this particular Contract Provision.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Unique identifier for this particular Contract Provision.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Unique identifier for this particular Contract Provision.

name: $topic
desc: Returns: The owner of an asset has the residual control rights over the asset: the right to decide all usages of the asset in any way not inconsistent with a prior contract, custom, or law (Hart, 1995, p. 30).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The owner of an asset has the residual control rights over the asset: the right to decide all usages of the asset in any way not inconsistent with a prior contract, custom, or law (Hart, 1995, p. 30).

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Type of Contract Provision such as specific requirements, purposes for actions, obligations, prohibitions, e.g. life time maximum benefit.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Type of Contract Provision such as specific requirements, purposes for actions, obligations, prohibitions, e.g. life time maximum benefit.

name: $decision
desc: Returns: Type of choice made by accepting party with respect to an offer made by an offeror/ grantee.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Type of choice made by accepting party with respect to an offer made by an offeror/ grantee.

name: $decisionMode
desc: Returns: How the decision about a Contract was conveyed.

name: $adddecisionMode
desc: How the decision about a Contract was conveyed.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: How the decision about a Contract was conveyed.

name: $text
desc: Returns: Human readable form of this Contract Offer.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Human readable form of this Contract Offer.

name: $linkId
desc: Returns: The id of the clause or question text of the offer in the referenced questionnaire/response.

name: $addlinkId
desc: The id of the clause or question text of the offer in the referenced questionnaire/response.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The id of the clause or question text of the offer in the referenced questionnaire/response.

name: $securityLabelNumber
desc: Returns: Security labels that protects the offer.

name: $addsecurityLabelNumber
desc: Security labels that protects the offer.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Security labels that protects the offer.
